name: BounceBall (EmberTheSunbro)
description:
Hold the left trigger to power up your shot.

Shoot your BounceBalls at the yellow targets to win each level. The glass walls will sometimes block you from shooting directly so get creative with it. 

There is only one world of levels for now, but a no gravity and moon gravity world are incoming. As well as a menu to get out of levels. (I want to experiment with UI in VR).

Design Stuff:  https://emberthesunbro.ca/portfolio/bounceball

Thanks for checking it out.
